instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Use .jsx extension for all components. TypeScript is NOT configured.
Implement 'Outfit' font for all Headings (h1-h3) and 'Inter' for Body.
Use the exact primary color #4F7DF3. Do not use default Tailwind blue.
Border Radius Strategy: Use 'rounded-3xl' for main cards, 'rounded-2xl' for inner cards, 'rounded-full' for buttons.
Shadows: Avoid harsh black shadows. Use colored shadows (primary/10) for a soft feel.
Dark Mode: Ensure all cards have a 1px border-white/5 in dark mode to separate them from the background.
Navigation: Use a bottom tab bar for mobile view and a clean sidebar for desktop.
Gamification: Use progress bars with 'bg-secondary' (Mint) to show positive growth.
Accessibility: Ensure text contrast ratio is > 4.5:1. Use 'text-foreground' on 'bg-background'.
Forms: Use Shadcn Form components but override styles to match the 'rounded-xl' input style.
Charts: Use Recharts with the 'Soft Pastel' palette defined in colors.
universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
NEVER use generic AI emojis. Use Lucide icons or specific SVG assets.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
